caption.p: Comparison of the herbaceous layer diversity and life forms between A. altissima (AA forests) and Native forests. ( a) total herbaceous species diversity ( p value = 0.05 *), ( b) nemoral species diversity ( p value = 0.065), ( c) therophyte species ( p value = 0.006 **), ( d) hemicryptophyte species ( p value = 0.085). p level: *** p < 0.001; ** p < 0.01; * p â‰¤ 0.05. Significant values are in bold.
